name: EditAuthnMapping
description:
Edit an AuthN Mapping in Datadog.

This tool allows editing an authentication mapping in Datadog. It should be called when modifications to an existing AuthN Mapping are needed.

parameters.name: authn_mapping_uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the AuthN Mapping to edit.

value_schema.description: The UUID of the AuthN Mapping.

parameters.name: authn_mapping_update_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing details for updating an AuthN Mapping, including attributes and relationships.

attribute_key.description: Key portion of a key/value pair of the attribute sent from the Identity Provider.

attribute_value.description: Value portion of a key/value pair of the attribute sent from the Identity Provider.

attributes.description: Key/Value pair of attributes used for update request.

relationships.description: Relationship of AuthN Mapping update object to a Role or Team.

data.description: Data for updating an AuthN Mapping.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: authn_mapping_id
parameters.description: The UUID of the AuthN Mapping.

value_schema.description: The UUID of the AuthN Mapping.

attribute_key.description: Key portion of a key/value pair of the attribute sent from the Identity Provider.

attribute_value.description: Value portion of a key/value pair of the attribute sent from the Identity Provider.

attributes.description: Key/Value pair of attributes used for update request.

relationships.description: Relationship of AuthN Mapping update object to a Role or Team.

data.description: Data for updating an AuthN Mapping.
